title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Integration patterns for multi-tenant systems (SAS312)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 多租户系统的集成模式 (SAS312)
abstract: Today's SaaS applications are interconnected: they expose APIs, publish events, call third-party services, and externalize states. Adding multi-tenancy to these integrations introduces new challenges. How do builders ensure tenant performance and data isolation whilst sharing resources? In this session, learn about common design trade-offs for multi-tenant integrations and how to navigate them with design patterns, illustrated by examples.
abstract_cn: 当今的 SaaS 应用程序是相互连接的：它们公开 API、发布事件、调用第三方服务并外部化状态。为这些集成添加多租户功能会带来新的挑战。构建者如何在共享资源的同时确保租户性能和数据隔离？在本次会议中，了解多租户集成的常见设计权衡，以及如何通过设计模式来应对这些挑战，并通过示例进行说明。
